localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"When faced with dilemmas, I have made choices that have been ill-received by this one."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"When faced with dilemmas, I have made choices that have been ill-received by this one."

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"I did not like the choices made by this one when faced with dilemmas."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"I did not like the choices made by this one when faced with dilemmas."

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_positive}}\n"When faced with dilemmas, I have made choices that this one has held in high-regard."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_positive}}\n"When faced with dilemmas, I have made choices that this one has held in high-regard."

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_positive}}\n"I liked the choices made by this one when faced with dilemmas."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_positive}}\n"I liked the choices made by this one when faced with dilemmas."

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"Important events have led us to increasingly dislike one another."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"Important events have led us to increasingly dislike one another."

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"Important events have led us to increasingly dislike one another."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"Important events have led us to increasingly dislike one another."

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"I sought to inflict personal harm upon them. Sadly, I may only have hurt their feelings."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"I sought to inflict personal harm upon them. Sadly, I may only have hurt their feelings."

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"This brute actually dared to inflict personal harm upon me! The audacity!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"This brute actually dared to inflict personal harm upon me! The audacity!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"I brought warning of ill-omens. Now they blame me for all of their misfortune!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"I brought warning of ill-omens. Now they blame me for all of their misfortune!"

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"They came babbling of ill-omens. Now I am cursed!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"They came babbling of ill-omens. Now I am cursed!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"I betrayed and abandoned them. My destiny lies along a different path!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"I betrayed and abandoned them. My destiny lies along a different path!"

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"They turned their back on my cause. This betrayal will not stand!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"They turned their back on my cause. This betrayal will not stand!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_rivals_negative}}\n"We were rivals in our youth. Some things are not easily forgotten."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_rivals_negative}}\n"We were rivals in our youth. Some things are not easily forgotten."

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_rivals_negative}}\n"We were rivals in our youth. Some things are not easily forgotten."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_rivals_negative}}\n"We were rivals in our youth. Some things are not easily forgotten."

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"I saw fit to insult this fool. The unpleasant truth is too much for some to bear!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"I saw fit to insult this fool. The unpleasant truth is too much for some to bear!"

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"This cur deigned to insult me! The outrage!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_negative}}\n"This cur deigned to insult me! The outrage!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_friends_negative}}\n"I upset somebody dear to them. They didn't appreciate that."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_friends_negative}}\n"I upset somebody dear to them. They didn't appreciate that."

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_friends_negative}}\n"They upset somebody dear to me. This will not do!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_friends_negative}}\n"They upset somebody dear to me. This will not do!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_rivals_negative}}\n"I supported somebody that they don't like. They do not approve."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_rivals_negative}}\n"I supported somebody that they don't like. They do not approve."

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_rivals_negative}}\n"They supported somebody that I don't like. What were they thinking?"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_rivals_negative}}\n"They supported somebody that I don't like. What were they thinking?"

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_positive}}\n"Important events have led us to increasingly appreciate one another."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_positive}}\n"Important events have led us to increasingly appreciate one another."

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_positive}}\n"Important events have led us to increasingly appreciate one another."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_positive}}\n"Important events have led us to increasingly appreciate one another."

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_friends_positive}}\n"We were friends in our youth. Fond memories!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_friends_positive}}\n"We were friends in our youth. Fond memories!"

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_friends_positive}}\n"We were friends in our youth. Fond memories!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_friends_positive}}\n"We were friends in our youth. Fond memories!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_family_positive}}\n"We are family. Friendship is everything, but family has no equal."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_family_positive}}\n"We are family. Friendship is everything, but family has no equal."

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_family_positive}}\n"We are family. Friendship is everything, but family has no equal."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_family_positive}}\n"We are family. Friendship is everything, but family has no equal."

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_positive}}\n"I brought news of good omens. Fortune now smiles favourably upon them!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_positive}}\n"I brought news of good omens. Fortune now smiles favourably upon them!"

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_positive}}\n"They spoke of good omens. I have since had known good fortune!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_past_event_positive}}\n"They spoke of good omens. I have since had known good fortune!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_politics_positive}}\n"We joined forces together. With our combined strength, we will prevail!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_politics_positive}}\n"We joined forces together. With our combined strength, we will prevail!"

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_politics_positive}}\n"We joined forces together. With our combined strength, we will prevail!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_politics_positive}}\n"We joined forces together. With our combined strength, we will prevail!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_rivals_positive}}\n"I upset somebody that they don't like. They approve."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_rivals_positive}}\n"I upset somebody that they don't like. They approve."

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_rivals_positive}}\n"They upset somebody that I don't like. Excellent!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_rivals_positive}}\n"They upset somebody that I don't like. Excellent!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_friends_positive}}\n"I supported somebody dear to them. They appreciated that."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_friends_positive}}\n"I supported somebody dear to them. They appreciated that."

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_friends_positive}}\n"They supported somebody dear to me. Very good!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_friends_positive}}\n"They supported somebody dear to me. Very good!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_opinions_negative}}\n"I cannot abide this person. It is a shame that we are related."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_opinions_negative}}\n"I cannot abide this person. It is a shame that we are related."

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_opinions_negative}}\n"I cannot abide this person. It is a shame that we are related."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_opinions_negative}}\n"I cannot abide this person. It is a shame that we are related."

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_opinions_positive}}\n"An agreeable person to know. I am honoured to share family ties with them!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_opinions_positive}}\n"An agreeable person to know. I am honoured to share family ties with them!"

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_opinions_positive}}\n"An agreeable person to know. I am honoured to share family ties with them!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_opinions_positive}}\n"An agreeable person to know. I am honoured to share family ties with them!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_opinions_negative}}\n"I regret having ever come to serve so contemptible a master."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_opinions_negative}}\n"I regret having ever come to serve so contemptible a master."

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_opinions_negative}}\n"I rue the day that I allowed this imbecile into my service!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_opinions_negative}}\n"I rue the day that I allowed this imbecile into my service!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_opinions_positive}}\n"It is a pleasure and an honour to serve under one so worthy."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_opinions_positive}}\n"It is a pleasure and an honour to serve under one so worthy."

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_opinions_positive}}\n"I am honoured to be served by one so loyal and effectual!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_opinions_positive}}\n"I am honoured to be served by one so loyal and effectual!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_politics_negative}}\n"They proved unworthy of office and were demoted accordingly."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_politics_negative}}\n"They proved unworthy of office and were demoted accordingly."

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_politics_negative}}\n"They stripped me of my office. I am indignant!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_politics_negative}}\n"They stripped me of my office. I am indignant!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_opinions_negative}}\n"Whilst serving together in office, I found this one to be insufferable!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_politics_positive}}\n"They showed great promise and were promoted to office accordingly."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_politics_positive}}\n"They showed great promise and were promoted to office accordingly."

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_politics_positive}}\n"They granted me an office. I am honoured!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_family_positive}}\n"I adopted this {$source$|gender=man|woman|person} into my family."

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_family_positive}}\n"I was adopted into this one's family. This is a singular honour!"

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_family_negative}}\n"This vile {$source$|gender=man|woman|person} divorced me!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_family_negative}}\n"This vile {$source$|gender=man|woman|person} divorced me!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_opinions_negative}}\n"A contemptible individual! I simply cannot abide time in their company."

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_negative}}\n"Diplomatic developments between our factions have been troubling."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_negative}}\n"Diplomatic developments between our factions have been troubling."

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_negative}}\n"Diplomatic developments between our factions have been troubling."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_negative}}\n"Diplomatic developments between our factions have been troubling."

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_negative}}\n"I took decisive diplomatic action. This one saw it as an act of betrayal."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_negative}}\n"I took decisive diplomatic action. This one saw it as an act of betrayal."

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_negative}}\n"This one stooped to diplomatic treachery, a betrayal of trust!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_negative}}\n"This one stooped to diplomatic treachery, a betrayal of trust!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_negative}}\n"We went to war with one another. This may not end well."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_negative}}\n"We went to war with one another. This may not end well."

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_negative}}\n"We went to war with one another. This may not end well."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_negative}}\n"We went to war with one another. This may not end well."

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_negative}}\n"It is sometimes necessary to wage war. This one does not understand."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_negative}}\n"It is sometimes necessary to wage war. This one does not understand."

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_negative}}\n"They are leading us to war, and to our ultimate destruction!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_negative}}\n"They are leading us to war, and to our ultimate destruction!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_positive}}\n"Where there is war, there must also be peace. This one understands."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_positive}}\n"Where there is war, there must also be peace. This one understands."

localised_description_target_character.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_positive}}\n"They seek to maintain peace. We shall all prosper from it!"

character_relationship_memories.localised_description_target_character: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_positive}}\n"They seek to maintain peace. We shall all prosper from it!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_positive}}\n"Diplomatic developments between our factions have been positive."

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_negative}}\n"Where there is war, there must also be peace. This one does not understand."

character_relationship_memories.localised_description: {{tr:3k_main_relationship_memory_factor_diplomacy_negative}}\n"Where there is war, there must also be peace. This one does not understand."
